_header: Now is man holy and saint
Subjects: debates, body and soul; body and soul, debate between
_description: Debate of the Body and Soul — a fragment, twenty-two lines in couplets and cross-rhymed quatrains

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Nou is mon hol & seintI huvel him comit in
                    mund…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…þu salt in horþe wonien & wormes to cheuen&
                    of alle ben lot þat her þeve lew
